mapper.select: SELECT `member`.`mem_idx`, `member`.`mem_id`,`member`.`mem_pw`,`member`.`mem_name`,`member`.`mem_birth`,`member`.`mem_nickname`,`member`.`mem_phone`,`member`.`mem_email`,`member`.`mem_address`,`member`.`mem_photo`,`member`.`mem_score` FROM `exchange`.`product` inner join `exchange`.`member` on product.mem_idx = member.mem_idx where product.pro_idx=#{pro_idx}
select * from `exchange`.`product` where pro_location like CONCAT('%',#{pro_location},'%')
